title: Interactive Rich Watch Face
summary: Exquisite watch face with marble-sharp animations and unmatched solid feel.
developerAddress: Ukraine, 02081, Kiev, Darnitskij area, Anna Akhmatova street, 22, office 4009

descriptionHTML:
💸“Waste neither time nor money, but make the best use of both.” – Benjamin Franklin

Solid, expensive look of your watch is something that tells everyone about your attitude to life immediately. Whether or not you hold a high status, this unique watch face will make a statement for you!

Enrich your smartwatch with premium, marble-sharp animations, customizable features, and unmatched feel of the Interactive Rich Watch Face.

🌟Main features:
- Four different styles (gold, dark, lite, and silver);
- Spinning dial rings for minutes and seconds;
- Interactive central button (displays date, battery or step count);
- Swap between functions via “wings” on the sides;
- Rich ambient mode design;
- Optional 12 and 24 hours display style.

⌚Is it for me?
Interactive Rich is designed for Android Wear watches and works perfectly both on round and square models.

Supports all Android Wear watches, including:
✔ ASUS ZenWatch 1;
✔ ASUS ZenWatch 2;
✔ Moto 360 Sport;
✔ Motorola 360 1st gen;
✔ Motorola 360 2nd gen;
✔ LG G Watch;
✔ LG G Watch R;
✔ LG G Watch Urbane;
✔ LG G Watch Urbane 2;
✔ Samsung Gear Live;
✔ Sony Smartwatch 3;
✔ Casio WSD-F10;
✔ Fossil Q Founder;
✔ Huawei Watch;
✔ TAG Heuer Connected.

💣Important Notice!💥
Samsung Gear, Samsung Gear S, Samsung Gear S2 are NOT YET supported. Please, for Samsung smartwatches based on Tizen follow the link: https://goo.gl/M1ABvk

🚀How to install?
This watch face will be installed automatically from your paired phone.
If it doesn't show up please go to the Android Wear App > Settings and Resync all apps.
Once installed, you can select the Interactive Rich Watch Face from the Android Wear App or directly on your watch. Few taps and you are ready to go!

📝Want to drop us a message?
We'd love hearing from you!
Contact us via our website: http://boostwatch.style
Google+ page: https://goo.gl/CJ79u2
or e-mail: wearables@boost.solutions

Waste neither time nor money, this is a perfect daily watch face that also makes a solid impression.
And don't forget to check out our store for more fine-crafted watch faces🙊
comments: Doesnt work with samsung gear 2 Bought this and found out the hard way I couldnt use it with my Gear 2.
Very nice   Only missing weather application.

Almost perfect i very much enjoy this watchface. Looks cool on my asus zenwatch 2.Never had one so detailed before. The more disapointing to find out that The lines and details in ambient mode are pixelated and partly undefined and even invisible. Really hope you will fix that in future but hey thanks anyway for The good job allready. Greetz Cliff
DB47 The developer is awesome. I had an issue loading watchface and they worked with to the tune of eight emails or so until they fixed my problem! Bravo. Customer service is still alive and well!

Good I like this so far but don't understand why there is a minute and seconds hand section when we have the digital time. It would be nice if there was an option to have just the hour above the date instead of the digital time.  Also needs more customization and colors
